Debs Best Recipes  

Orange Pancakes

1 cup whole wheat flour
 1 egg, beaten
1/4 cup soy flour
 2 tbs honey
1/2 tsp salt
 1/4 cup plain yogurt or milk
2 tsp baking powder 3 tbs oil or melted butter
1 tsp grated orange rind                               

 1 - 1 1/2 cups ricotta cheese

Stir dry ingredients together.   In a separate bowl combine the egg, honey, yogurt and butter.   Stir the wet into the dry ingredients - not too much - just enough to moisten the dry ingredients well.  

Make 4 large pancakes on an oiled griddle (about 2/3 cup per pancake).  Stack them up spreading ricotta cheese between each one, ending with a pancake.

 

Orange Sauce

1 tbs cornstarch
1/4 tsp salt
2 tbs orange rind
1 cup orange juice
1/4 cup honey
1 tbs butter
1 fresh orange, diced

Mix all ingredients together except for the butter and orange.  Bring to a boil stirring constantly until thickened.  Remove from heat and add the butter and orange pieces.

Serve warm over pancakes.
